title: Yuxin Liang
text:
Hi there!
Welcome to my personal website
I hold a Master’s degree in Social Policy and Data Analysis from the University of Pennsylvania. I also have a Bachelor’s degree in International Politics from Fudan University and a Bachelor’s degree in Political Science from Waseda University.
Where do I belong? I am still looking for.
My passion lies in data analysis and visualization, and I enjoy working with tools like R, Python, Excel, and mapping software such as ArcGIS and QGIS. I aim to leverage my skills to help people better understand and utilize policy and data to improve well-being. My interests particularly focus on health policy in the US and around the world.
In addition to my professional pursuits, I’m an avid fan of Broadway musicals and have a keen interest in photography. Explore my website to see my data-related projects and some of the photos I’ve captured along the way.
